title: ICE: Error constructed but not emitted
body:
Hello,

When using `rustfmt` 0.5.0, with latest nightly `rustc 1.10.0-nightly (764ef92ae 2016-05-19)`, I have a ICE when formatting a very simple piece of code:

```
echo "pub mod foo;" | rustfmt
error: internal compiler error: Error constructed but not emitted
thread '<main>' panicked at 'explicit panic', /Users/octplane/.multirust/toolchains/nightly/cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/syntex_syntax-0.32.0/src/errors/mod.rs:361
stack backtrace:
   1:        0x109284c58 - std::sys::backtrace::tracing::imp::write::h9fb600083204ae7f
   2:        0x109286b15 - std::panicking::default_hook::_$u7b$$u7b$closure$u7d$$u7d$::hca543c34f11229ac
   3:        0x10928674e - std::panicking::default_hook::hc2c969e7453d080c
   4:        0x1092792b0 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::hfe203e3083c2b544
   5:        0x1090e96d4 - std::panicking::begin_panic::h4ebf9fe884b2415f
   6:        0x1090eb6a4 - _<errors..DiagnosticBuilder<'a> as std..ops..Drop>::drop::hf9983317f4db5217
   7:        0x108ff7f8b - rustfmt::format_input::hb55408203a5b2f7d
   8:        0x108ffcd7e - rustfmt::run::hc3c3f45cca8c2090
   9:        0x108fe9b86 - rustfmt::execute::h7a803e49ef9bfa61
  10:        0x108fec524 - rustfmt::main::h72bee7f7a14fa8c0
  11:        0x10928633d - std::panicking::try::call::hc5e1f5b484ec7f0e
  12:        0x109289dab - __rust_try
  13:        0x109289d45 - __rust_maybe_catch_panic
  14:        0x109286161 - std::rt::lang_start::h61f4934e780b4dfc
```

Not sure where to report that but folks #rust-fr told me this was the place because this is an ICE.

`cargo install rustfmt` trace so that we have all deps version:

```
    Updating registry `https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index`
```
